title: My 12th is 47% will i get a job?
content:
and my 10th is 60% , BCA is 8cgpa and mca is 7cgpa will i able to get a better placement in MCA? 
Please tell me

comments.body: It will be tough if your just starting but not impossible it will definitely limit alot in mass recruitments where companies filter on board marks. But overall it won't make a huge dent
I got a placement offer of accenture pada role 3.8lpa job  during my bca so will i get above 5+ lpa ?

Hey, I don't want to intrude and it's fine if you do not wish to answer me,

But could you tell me a bit more about this job? 
Where did you go your bca? How long did you work?

Thank you in advance. And again it's fine if you don't wanna answer
Hey that depends on how you perform in the interviews , considering you meet the minimum qualifications and your interview goes well then why not , you can get 5+lpa

Its a off campus role of accenture i applied and cleared it the aptitude is is and there are 3-4 rounds but the process was all 8-9 months and i still havenâ€™t received the offer letter but they told that i will be soon Reciving the offer letter bcz as of i know if i am in document verification stage than it means i cleared the accenture
